name: Horse High Jump Racing
description:
This challenging and intense Horse Riding and High Jumping experience game should appeal to all of you adventure enthusiasts out there.Horse High Jump Racing is all about Racing that’s full of hasty pace and adrenaline pumping thrills.
Features:
* Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Addictive Experience.
* Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
